meanings.definition: Situated in or relating to the middle of the sagittal plane.
meanings.sent1: The midsagittal line divides the brain into two equal parts.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon made a precise incision along the midsagittal plane.
meanings.sent3: The midsagittal view of the MRI scan looked like a perfectly sliced sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a midsagittal line in the chaos of the room.
meanings.sent5: The midsagittal position of the star on the map guided us accurately.

meanings.definition: Dividing the body into left and right halves.
meanings.sent1: The midsagittal cut revealed the internal organs clearly.
meanings.sent2: The midsagittal symmetry of the butterfly's wings was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The midsagittal cake was shared equally between the two friends.
meanings.sent4: The midsagittal mirror in the funhouse made everyone look funny.
meanings.sent5: The midsagittal shadow on the wall made it seem like two people were standing there.
